title: Register to Vote
description: A citizen who recently moved to the state needs to register to vote.

tasks.description: Gather the citizen's personal information, address, and proof of residency.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent collects all necessary information for the voter registration application.

tasks.description: Verify the citizen's eligibility to vote.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent confirms the citizen meets the age and residency requirements.

tasks.description: Process the voter registration application and inform the citizen they will receive a voter registration card in the mail.
